name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with garlic, salt, and pepper. Grill over medium heat, skin-side down, for 6-8 minutes. Flip and cook until desired doneness.

name: Fish Tacos
instructions: Cook fish until golden and flaky. Serve on warmed tortillas with slaw and sauce. Squeeze lime over tacos before serving.

name: Lemon Butter Cod
instructions: Melt butter in a skillet, add garlic and lemon juice. Cook cod in the skillet until cooked through. Garnish with parsley.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Brown beef. Add mushrooms and onion, cook until soft. Stir in flour and mustard, add broth. Simmer until thick. Remove from heat, mix in sour cream.

name: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Bread chicken with breadcrumbs and parmesan. Bake until golden. Top with marinara and mozzarella, bake until cheese is melted.

name: Pork Chops with Apples
instructions: Cook pork chops until browned. In the same skillet, add apples, cinnamon, and sugar. Cook until apples are soft. Serve pork chops topped with apple mixture.

name: Vegan Chili
instructions: Saute onion and peppers. Add tomatoes, beans, and spices. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Tofu Stir-Fry
instructions: Press tofu, then cube. Saute vegetables, add tofu. Stir in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Serve over rice.

name: Vegan Lasagna
instructions: Layer sauce, noodles, ricotta, vegetables, and repeat. Cover and bake for 45 minutes. Uncover, bake for 15 more minutes.
